name: Tax Evasion Simulator 2019
description:
Have you ever wanted to commit Tax Evasion? If so, what is wrong with you? But also, this is the game for you!

You can:

-Not pay your taxes

-Sit and not pay your taxes

-Stand and not pay your taxes

-Commit tax evasion

-Throw away your taxes

Future updates will let you:

-Get harassed by the police about your taxes

-Play with more physics objects

-Commit more tax evasion

Note: This game is a joke, don't actually commit tax evasion, tax fraud, or any other illegal acts involving your taxes.

This game is also in it's early demo stages, expect more updates to come.
